#### **Overview**  
This project involves building involved building a MYbar RSVP system and visualize marketing campaign performance though Instamatics. Metrics were used to track attendance rate, conversion rate, and ROI were tracked across channels using RSVPS, and total attendance.

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Learning Outcomes**  
- Visualize and monitor key marketing metrics.  
- Analyze performance trends across multiple campaigns.  
- Identify high- and low-performing segments.  
- Communicate insights through interactive visuals.  
- Develop data-informed recommendations.
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Key Skills Gained**  
- Dashboard development  
- Campaign analytics  
- Data wrangling in R  
- Tableau or R Shiny visualization  
- Performance measurement
:::
